Articles.Content: Hi. I've just bought Kerbal Space Programme Enhanced Edition for the PS4 and some of the commands don't seem to work. I have built the first rocket as per the tutorial but 'O' does not engage the SAS and X does not initiate launch. Please advise.

KSP has been known to wig out here and there. This is very common. In order to launch press the X button. But if that doesn’t work make sure throttle is up. But if it doesn’t work, congrats you have a bug. This one is easy to kill though. Hold the PS4 button and go and close the application Kerbal Space Program Enhanced Edition. Restart or turn off your PS4. Then go back to KSP. The big should be fixed if not wait a day and do the same.

Edited October 5, 2020 by Dr. Kerbal
Clarification.

On 8/9/2020 at 11:30 AM, Robnw67 said:

Hi. I've just bought Kerbal Space Programme Enhanced Edition for the PS4 and some of the commands don't seem to work. I have built the first rocket as per the tutorial but 'O' does not engage the SAS and X does not initiate launch. Please advise. 

It should work. Maybe try @Dr. Kerbal's solution, I don't play PS (XBOX RULES) but I looked at the controller mapping, and that should be correct.
